main event: Nine triangular reddish orange objects were observed hovering in a straight line before rising and disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5 minutes and was visually observed from the ground., The objects were described as triangular and reddish orange., The movement of the objects was identified as stationary before moving into the distance., The report concluded that the objects were not balloons or aircraft but could be astronomical or astro-meteorological., Weather conditions included scattered clouds and visibility of fifteen miles at the time of the sighting.
